newsitem.title: USA: Merrill Lynch top private placement agent.
newsitem.headline: Merrill Lynch top private placement agent.

text.p: Securities Data Co said on Friday that Merrill Lynch and Co Inc in 1996 retained its position as the leading private placement firm, accounting for 10.9 percent of industrywide volume.
The year saw a record volume of $201.3 billion in private placements, edging the $199.7 billion racked up in 1989.

Proceeds from Merrill's 357 placements totaled $21.88 billion, up from the company's $14.43 billion total in 1995. Credit Suisse First Boston ranked second with $18.73 billion from 373 issues, while J.P. Morgan & Co Inc was third with $14.91 billion from 203 issues.
